mapper.select: SELECT * FROM CROP ORDER BY CROP_NAME

SELECT F.FDIARY_NO ,F.FDIARY_DAY ,TO_CHAR(F.FDIARY_DAY, 'YYYYMMDD') as FDAY ,F.FDIARY_STIME ,F.FDIARY_ETIME ,F.FDIARY_WORKER ,F.FDIARY_WEATHER ,F.FDIARY_CONTENT ,F.USER_ID ,F.CROP_NO ,F.FDIARY_FILENAME ,C.CROP_NAME FROM FARMDIARY F JOIN CROP C ON (F.CROP_NO = C.CROP_NO) WHERE F.USER_ID = #{user_id} AND F.FDIARY_DAY = TO_DATE( #{fdiary_day} ,'YYYYMMDD')

SELECT F.FDIARY_NO ,F.FDIARY_DAY ,TO_CHAR(F.FDIARY_DAY, 'YYYYMMDD') as FDAY ,F.FDIARY_STIME ,F.FDIARY_ETIME ,F.FDIARY_WORKER ,F.FDIARY_WEATHER ,F.FDIARY_CONTENT ,F.USER_ID ,F.CROP_NO ,F.FDIARY_FILENAME ,C.CROP_NAME FROM FARMDIARY F JOIN CROP C ON (F.CROP_NO = C.CROP_NO) WHERE FDIARY_NO = #{fdiary_no}

SELECT FDIARY_DAY, COUNT(*) AS DCOUNT ,TO_CHAR(FDIARY_DAY,'YYYY') AS F_YEAR ,TO_CHAR(FDIARY_DAY,'MM') AS F_MONTH ,TO_CHAR(FDIARY_DAY,'DD') AS F_DAY FROM FARMDIARY WHERE USER_ID=#{user_id} GROUP BY FDIARY_DAY ORDER BY FDIARY_DAY
